info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 9:43PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Hidalgo County through 1030 PM MDT... At 943 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles southwest of Rodeo to 13 miles north of Cloverdale. Movement was southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cloverdale, Camp Garza, Geronimo Pass and Skeleton Canyon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
